title: Southwest Detroit shooting kills man, wounds girl in nearby house
content:
A double shooting in southwest Detroit has killed one person and injured a teen.
A 27-year-old man was shot to death at McGraw and Proctor when three suspects ambushed him, opening fire.
One of the stray bullets wounded the girl inside a house nearby. Police say the bullet went through either the wall or a window before wounding her hand. She is expected to recover.
Police are searching for three suspects who opened fire on the man who had been standing near a taco truck. They are described as three black males fled from a nearby alley. No description has been released by police.
Southwest Detroit shooting kills man, wounds girl in nearby house
Anyone with information is asked to call Detroit police at (313) 596-5200 or Crime Stoppers at 1-800-SPEAK-UP.
Stay with FOX 2 for more information as it becomes available.
